steps.name: When I check element color is "#1a73e8"
When I check selected language is "English" on tab "Text"
When I search and select language "English" on tab "Text"
When I check element color is "#1a73e8"
When I check selected language is "Ukrainian" on tab "Text"
When I search and select language "Ukrainian" on tab "Text"
When I select translate from "English" to "Ukrainian" on "Text" tab
When I insert source text "Helo! How are you? This is the text for translation check"
When I check text correction message "Showing translation for: Привіт"
When I click text correction option "Translate instead: Helo! How are you? This is the text for translation check"
When I check text correction message "Did you mean:: Hello"
When I click text correction option "Did you mean:: Hello! How are you? This is the text for translation check"
When I check translated text "Привіт! Як справи? Це текст для перевірки перекладу"
